title: Fix missing Add Data button in bird data table

requirements.text: Restore the Add Data button in the bird data table page (BirdDataTable.tsx) that allows users to create new bird records with fields for name, coordinates, images, audio files, and description

quotes: لا يوجد زر اضافة البيانات في صفحة جدول بيانات الطيور

acceptanceCriteria: Add Data button is visible in the BirdDataTable component
Clicking the button opens a dialog/form for creating new bird records
Form includes fields for bird name, coordinates, images, audio, and description
Users can successfully submit new bird data through the form
New records appear in the bird data table after creation

constraints: Do not modify backend schema or API endpoints
Maintain existing inline editing functionality in the table
Keep existing Excel/PDF export features intact
nonGoals: Changing the overall table layout or structure
Changing the data model or field types
